Class Rook

java.lang.Object
org.douggschwind.games.chess.piece.ChessPiece
org.douggschwind.games.chess.piece.Rook
All Implemented Interfaces:
CaptureUponAdvance
public class Rook extends ChessPiece implements CaptureUponAdvance
Represents one of the two Rook pieces in the game of Chess, for a given Player.

    • canMoveTo

      public boolean canMoveTo(ChessBoard chessBoard, CommonMove proposedMove)
      Rooks move horizontally or vertically any number of squares. They are unable to jump over pieces. Rooks move when the king castles.
      Specified by:
      canMoveTo in class ChessPiece
      Parameters:
      chessBoard - Must be non-null.
      proposedMove - Must be non-null and properly populated.
